source.value: Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City

description.value:
Activate A Strike

This flask filled with corrosive acid deals 1 acid damage, 3d6 persistent acid damage, and 3 acid splash damage. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.

The liquid reagents in this vial rapidly absorb heat when exposed to air. A frost vial deals the listed cold damage and cold splash damage. On a hit, the target takes a status penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn. Many types of frost vial also grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls, the bomb deals 3d6 cold damage and 3 cold splash damage, and the target takes a -10-foot penalty.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.Effect: Frost Vial (Greater)]{Effect: Frost Vial (Greater)}

rules.text: Effect Target takes a -10-foot penalty to its Speeds.

description.value: A light mace has a short wooden or metal shaft ending with a dense metal head. Used much like a club, it delivers heavy bludgeoning blows, but with extra power derived from the head's metal ridges or spikes.

When this stone hits a creature or a hard surface, it explodes with a deafening bang. A thunderstone deals the listed sonic damage and sonic splash damage, and each creature within 10 feet of the space in which the stone exploded must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|name:Greater Thunderstone|showDC:all] saving throw with the listed DC or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Deafened]{Deafened} until the end of its next turn. Many types of thunderstone grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 3d4 sonic damage and 3 sonic splash damage, and the DC is 28.
A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.

These brass goggles are engraved with flame patterns and have thick, heavy lenses.

While worn, they give you a +2 item bonus to Crafting checks to Craft alchemical items and a +2 item bonus to attack rolls with alchemical bombs.

You can also ignore lesser cover when making Strikes with alchemical bombs.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Acid Flask (Greater)]{Acid Flask (Greater)}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Tanglefoot Bag (Greater)]{Tanglefoot Bag (Greater)}
This mobile collection of vials and chemicals can be used for simple alchemical tasks.

Activate A Interact

Elixirs of life accelerate a living creature''s natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain [[/r {7d6+18}[healing]]]{7d6+18 Hit Points} and gain +2 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.Effect: Elixir of Life (Greater)]{Effect: Elixir of Life (Greater)}
Zuferian's items listed as infused last for 24 hours, or until her next daily preparations.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Acid Flask (Greater)]{Acid Flask (Greater)}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Alchemist's Fire (Greater)]{Alchemist's Fire (Greater)}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Bottled Lightning (Greater)]{Bottled Lightning (Greater)}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Darkvision Elixir (Greater)]{Darkvision Elixir (Greater)}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Deathcap Powder]{Deathcap Powder}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Elixir of Life (Greater)]{Elixir of Life (Greater)}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Frost Vial (Greater)]{Frost Vial (Greater)}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Lethargy Poison]{Lethargy Poison}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Purple Worm Venom]{Purple Worm Venom}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Tanglefoot Bag (Greater)]{Tanglefoot Bag (Greater)}
Zuferian's bombs that have the splash trait deal 8 extra splash damage, and splash to 10 feet.

Zuferian creates a single alchemical item from her formula book. This item has the infused trait, but it remains potent only until the start of her next turn. With her typical preparations, she can use this ability 7 times per day.
Zuferian Interacts to draw a bomb, then Strikes with it.

When Zuferian uses Debilitating Bomb, add the following to the list of effects Zuferian can choose from:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2}
  • a -15-foot status penalty to Speeds.

If Zuferian instead applies one of the effects listed in Debilitating Bomb, the target avoids the effect only if the result of its saving throw is a critical success.

When Zuferian throws an alchemical item with the bomb trait, its range increment increases to 60 feet, Zuferian reduces any circumstance bonus to the target's AC from cover by 1, and Zuferian automatically succeeds at the flat check when targeting a concealed creature.
